import React ,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from "axios" import Bar from './Bar'; import "../css/basket.min.css" const Basket = props => { const [data, setData] = useState({ hits: [] }); useEffect(async () => { const result = await axios( 'https://hn.algolia.com/api/v1/search?query=redux', ); setData(result.data); }); return (
